API_Description: !! Note `popUpMenuEx` is preferred over this method.

cItem.description: (optional) If the argument is a string, it is listed in the menu as a menu item. The menu item name “-” is reserved to draw a separator line in the menu.

Array.description: (optional) If the argument is an array, it appears as a submenu where the first element in the array is the parent menu item. This array can contain further submenus.

Returns: The name of the menu item that was selected, or `null` if no item was selected.
